text: Michael Reeves (born November 20, 1997) is an American YouTuber and Twitch streamer best known for his robotics-focused videos. He is a member of OfflineTV, an online social entertainment group of content creators. He was born in Maui, Hawaii. In December 2019, Reeves had joined OfflineTV, a group Twitch streamers creating content. In June 2020, Reeves began streaming on Twitch, where he streams both video games and technology work. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:American YouTubers Category:Twitch (service) streamers Category:Entertainers from Hawaii
title: Michael Reeves (Internet personality)
